attributes.additional_details: Since the BBC states it's having to make cuts and can no longer produce good quality programs and are having to put repeated programs on time after time but how is it that the BBC can still waste license fees money on game shows, auction shows which blatantly waste money and since the BBC apparently don't advertise yet they plug more books, albums and DVD's for celebrities than ever. We the people of the United Kingdom would like the government to take action at making the BBC source it's income like all the other TV channels.
